p: For extraction, the frankincense oleogum resins were cooled down to −20 °C and ground. 10 g of freshly ground resins were extracted with 40 mL methanol at room temperature for 45 min with continuous stirring. After centrifugation (5 min at 5000× g), the supernatant was collected and the extraction was repeated twice. The combined supernatants were filtered through regenerated cellulose and evaporated to dryness by using a rotary evaporator yielding frankincense extract.
